TableSettings.uniqueName: IdeConnections%23Trunkselect decode((select count(*) from safe_cp_workflow_mapping m where m.visitor_type_code = w.visitor_type_code and m.collection_point_code = :cnpt_code), 0, 'N', 'Y') kiosk_workflow, count(*) over () as count, w.visitor_type_code, w.visitor_type_description, w.visitor_type_workflow, w.label_code, w.print_on_checkin, w.email_checkin_prompt, w.video_reference, w.enable_default_host, w.host_health_survey, w.unnamed_visitors, w.enable_checkin_email, w.guest_list_ind, nvl(w.employee_verification_ind,'N') employee_verification_ind from safe_kiosk_workflow w join safe_cp_workflow_mapping m on m.visitor_type_code = w.visitor_type_code where w.event_ind = nvl(trim(:is_event), 'N') and m.collection_point_code = :cnpt_code order by case safe_get_setting_or_null('alphabetical_workflow_order') when 'Y' then w.visitor_type_description else to_char(w.workflow_order, 'fm0000000') end
